recipesJson.name: Jarvis - Mixin Vixens Episode - 27  A Unicorn Pooped in My Scoop
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: Blue Raspberry mixed with wild berries and a cotton candy twist in some ice cream-- if you like it cool add in 0.5% of WS-23.  I prefer it cold so I go 0.75% WS-23.
